vote.text: Amendment SA 2120 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2120 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Kelly. (consideration: CR S4795; text: CR S4795) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2120 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
